title.rendered: Findlay Beveridge Appointed as Managing Director of Medusa Equip

content.rendered:
We are excited to announce that former Medusa Equip sales director Findlay Beveridge has been promoted to the managing director role at Medusa Equip, to lead the growth of Medusa Equip as a Medusa Group company.

Mr Beveridge said: “I am delighted to have returned to the leadership role with Medusa Equip and look forward to navigating the business through this transition period to build upon the strong foundations already in place here.

Beyond that, we will manage the integration of the Medusa Equip brand and proprietary product line with Pryme’s manufacturing expertise to help capture increased market share.”
You can read the full press release at here Energy Voice.
